mapper.select: SELECT A.KEY_ID AS keyId ,A.TNC_STD_ITEM_ID AS tncStdItemId ,A.TNC_STD_VAL AS tncStdVal ,A.RAISE_DATE AS raiseDate ,A.FIX_DATE AS fixDate ,A.DISCUSS_STATUS AS discussStatus FROM PD_TNC_STD_DISCUSS_MARKET A WHERE A.STANDARD_ID=#{filterMap.standardId} AND A.TNC_STD_ITEM_ID = #{filterMap.tncStdItemId} AND A.DISCUSS_STATUS != #{filterMap.discussStatus} ORDER BY A.DISCUSS_STATUS DESC

SELECT A.KEY_ID AS keyId ,A.TNC_STD_ITEM_ID AS tncStdItemId ,A.TNC_STD_VAL AS tncStdVal ,A.SL_PD_ID AS slPdId ,A.RAISE_DATE AS raiseDate ,A.FIX_DATE AS fixDate ,A.DISCUSS_STATUS AS discussStatus FROM PD_TNC_STD_DISCUSS_PROVIDER A WHERE A.STANDARD_ID=#{filterMap.standardId} AND A.TNC_STD_ITEM_ID = #{filterMap.tncStdItemId} AND A.DISCUSS_STATUS != #{filterMap.discussStatus} ORDER BY A.DISCUSS_STATUS DESC

SELECT A.KEY_ID AS keyId ,A.TNC_STD_ITEM_ID AS tncStdItemId ,A.TNC_STD_VAL AS tncStdVal ,A.RAISE_DATE AS raiseDate ,A.FIX_DATE AS fixDate FROM PD_TNC_STD_DISCUSS_MARKET A WHERE A.STANDARD_ID=#{filterMap.standardId} AND A.TNC_STD_ITEM_ID = #{filterMap.tncStdItemId} AND A.DISCUSS_STATUS = #{filterMap.discussStatus} ORDER BY A.DISCUSS_STATUS

SELECT A.KEY_ID AS keyId ,A.TNC_STD_ITEM_ID AS tncStdItemId ,A.TNC_STD_VAL AS tncStdVal ,A.SL_PD_ID AS slPdId ,A.FIX_DATE AS fixDate FROM PD_TNC_STD_DISCUSS_PROVIDER A WHERE A.STANDARD_ID=#{filterMap.standardId} AND A.TNC_STD_ITEM_ID = #{filterMap.tncStdItemId} AND A.DISCUSS_STATUS = #{filterMap.discussStatus} ORDER BY A.DISCUSS_STATUS

SELECT A.GNQ_STD_ITEM_ID AS gnqStdItemId ,A.GNQ_STD_ITEM_NAME AS gnqStdItemName FROM PD_GNQ_STD_ITEM AS A WHERE A.LEVEL_ID = #{filterMap.levelId} AND A.PARENT_ID = #{filterMap.parentId} ORDER BY A.GNQ_STD_ITEM_ID

SELECT A.SFT_STD_ITEM_ID AS sftStdItemId ,A.SFT_STD_ITEM_NAME AS sftStdItemName FROM PD_SFT_STD_ITEM AS A WHERE A.LEVEL_ID = #{filterMap.levelId} AND A.PARENT_ID = #{filterMap.parentId} ORDER BY A.SFT_STD_ITEM_ID

SELECT A.TSP_STD_ITEM_ID AS tspStdItemId ,A.TSP_STD_ITEM_NAME AS tspStdItemName FROM PD_TSP_STD_ITEM AS A WHERE A.LEVEL_ID = #{filterMap.levelId} AND A.PARENT_ID = #{filterMap.parentId} ORDER BY A.TSP_STD_ITEM_ID

SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(PD_LOT) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE MAX(PD_LOT)+1 END AS pdLot FROM PD_GRADE_SELLER_ONLINE WHERE SL_ID = #{filterMap.slId} AND SL_PD_ID = #{filterMap.slPdId} AND SL_CODE_DIS = #{filterMap.slCodeDis} AND STANDARD_ID = #{filterMap.standardId}
SELECT STANDARD_ID AS standardId FROM PD_STANDARD WHERE CLASSESTREE_CODE=#{filterMap.classestreeCode}
